verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of the sons of Korah.) O <S%H8628>Clap<s%> your <S%H3709>hands,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> <S%H7321>Shout<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>joy.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High<s%> is to be <S%H3372>feared,<s%> A <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He <S%H977>chooses<s%> our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for us, The <S%H1347>glory<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> He <S%H157>loves.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5927>ascended<s%> with a <S%H8643>shout,<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> with the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H7782>trumpet.<s%>
For <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> <S%H2167>Sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> with a <S%H4905>skillful<s%> <S%H4905>psalm.<s%>

The <S%H5081>princes<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H622>assembled<s%> themselves [as] the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham;<s%> For the <S%H4043>shields<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> belong to <S%H430>God;<s%> He is <S%H3966>highly<s%> <S%H5927>exalted.<s%>
